author: Cedric Canard
content:
Bengt Carlsson is a good find and I can see the similarity between your photos and his but more in terms of honesty, simplicity and feeling rather than straight out style or subject matter. Though composition also seems quite similar. In any case thanks for the link.

Great picture too. It has stong impact and symmetry with just the right offset on the right for which to rest the eyes on.
